subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Guard Erving Walker, at barely 5 feet 8 inches, has been a well-regarded figure in New York basketball circles since he was in elementary school and has earned a scholarship to play at Florida.
snippet: Guard Erving Walker, at barely 5 feet 8 inches, has been a well-regarded figure in New York basketball circles since he was in elementary school and has earned a scholarship to play at Florida.
